parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns density of clouds at given position.

</value></part><part><name>pr </name>=<value> <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>edeneditor</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>SimulWeather seems to be disabled in [[Eden Editor]] and scenario preview.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[simulCloudDensity]] pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> pos: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> 
* [[Number]] -  Density (0-1)
* [[Nothing]] - If arguments are incorrect
* [[Boolean]] - Returns [[false]] if simulWeather is disabled

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[simulCloudDensity]] [[getPos]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setSimulWeatherLayers]], [[simulCloudOcclusion]], [[simulInClouds]]
</value></part></template></root>
